DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Determine recruitment rate propose randomize control trial ( RCT ) . II . Determine rate intervention adherence . III . Determine feasibility train National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) Community Oncology Research Program ( NCORP ) clinical research staff successfully deliver Brief Behavioral Therapy ( BBT ) intervention . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Obtain preliminary estimate effect intervention ( compare control ) insomnia measure Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) . II . Obtain preliminary estimate effect intervention ( compare control ) sleep quality measure Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) . III . Obtain preliminary estimate effect intervention ( compare control ) circadian rhythm measure two-oscillator cosinor parameter estimate base actigraphy data . IV . TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . Obtain preliminary estimate effect intervention ( compare control ) quality life measure Functional Assessment Chronic Illness Therapy ( FACIT ) total score subscales . II . Obtain preliminary estimate effect intervention ( compare control ) general mood measure Profile Mood States ( POMS ) total score subscales . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Patients undergo BBT intervention , comprise insomnia education , stimulus control , discouragement nap encouragement exercise , sleep compression two 60 minute face-to-face session week 1 3 4 , four 15 minute telephone session week 2 , 3 , 5 , 6 2 , 4 , 5 , 6 . ARM II : Patients undergo Healthy Eating Education ( HEAL ) comprise nutritional education suggestion symptom management two 60 minute face-to-face session week 1 2 3 , four 15 minute telephone session week 2 , 3 , 5 , 6 2 , 4 , 5 , 6 . After completion study , patient follow 1 month .
